name: Planetary Defense (itch) (speedy1619, Slick5003)
description:
Game developed by a team of 2 for the ScoreSpaceJam 17

Game has all mouse controls, click to fire a projectile to the mouse position, projectile will explode when it reaches the fire point destroying anything near it. (Similar to Missile Command)

Click powerup buttons on bottom left of screen to activate powerups once collected from defeated enemies.
